"Quick Menu Customization":
"\"Quick Menu Customization\" is a feature that allows you to change the options available to you in the Quick Menu.

With the Quick Menu open, use <%MultiSelect> to access the \"Edit/Change Pattern\" option. You can then use the \"Select Pattern\" menu to change your Pattern or edit your Pattern's name."
"You can use the \"Pattern Details\" menu to add, remove and rearrange items in your Pattern."

"You can also add Categories to the list, which separate your items with blue labels.

Customize your Quick Menu however you like, and make it as easy as possible to get to the functions you use most."
